There the incarnate's personal mor- phogenetic field is evaluated to determine if Templar Sealing is in order as a planetary security measure, and if the Seals are unwarranted the Elohim peti- tion the Ra Confederacy to remove any trace of the Templar Seals. If the Ra Confederacy agrees, the Seals are removed and the incarnate's consciousness is allowed to pass through the eighth dimension where the DNA imprint in the morphogenetic field is repaired. The eighth-dimensional meeting place and passage way into the Metagalactic Core is often referred to as the Eye of Elohi m, or the Galactic Core. Humans not bearing Templar Seal distortion can pass through this dimensional portal once they have fully evolved their 34
